Package org.neo4j.internal.nativeimpl

Interface NativeAccess

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsentNativeAccess, LinuxNativeAccess
    public interface NativeAccess

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int ERROR
      Generic operation error
      static int SUCCESS
      Operation completed successfully

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String describe()
      Details about native access provider
      boolean isAvailable()
      Check if native access is available
      NativeCallResult tryAdviseSequentialAccess​(int fd)
      Try to advice that file referenced by provided file descriptor will be accessed in a sequential fashion.
      NativeCallResult tryAdviseToKeepInCache​(int fd)
      Try to advice that file referenced by provided file descriptor will be accessed again in the near future and we will need those pages again.
      NativeCallResult tryEvictFromCache​(int fd)
      Try to evict cached pages of file referenced by provided file descriptor.
      NativeCallResult tryPreallocateSpace​(int fd, long bytes)
      Try to preallocate disk space for file referenced by provided file descriptor.

    • Field Detail

      • SUCCESS

        static final int SUCCESS
        Operation completed successfully
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ERROR

        static final int ERROR
        Generic operation error
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • isAvailable

        boolean isAvailable()
        Check if native access is available
        Returns:
        true if available, false otherwise

      • tryEvictFromCache

        NativeCallResult tryEvictFromCache​(int fd)
        Try to evict cached pages of file referenced by provided file descriptor. Useful for files that we do not need to access ever again. For example: log files, WAL files, etc.
        Parameters:
        fd - file descriptor
        Returns:
        returns zero on success, or an error number on failure

      • tryAdviseSequentialAccess

        NativeCallResult tryAdviseSequentialAccess​(int fd)
        Try to advice that file referenced by provided file descriptor will be accessed in a sequential fashion. Useful for files that we will read from start to the end sequentially. For example: WAL files.
        Parameters:
        fd - file descriptor
        Returns:
        returns zero on success, or an error number on failure

      • tryAdviseToKeepInCache

        NativeCallResult tryAdviseToKeepInCache​(int fd)
        Try to advice that file referenced by provided file descriptor will be accessed again in the near future and we will need those pages again. Useful for files that we will read from start to the end sequentially. For example: WAL files.
        Parameters:
        fd - file descriptor
        Returns:
        returns zero on success, or an error number on failure

      • tryPreallocateSpace

        NativeCallResult tryPreallocateSpace​(int fd,
                                     long bytes)
        Try to preallocate disk space for file referenced by provided file descriptor.
        Parameters:
        fd - file descriptor
        bytes - number of bytes to preallocate
        Returns:
        returns zero on success, or an error number on failure

      • describe

        String describe()
        Details about native access provider
        Returns:
        details about native access
